raw: {"customer_engagement":130,"integration_of_feedback":135,"outcome_focus":125,"overall_score":130,"comments":"The CEO demonstrates a strong, comprehensive approach to embedding customer feedback into product development. Establishing multiple feedback channels and fostering cross-functional collaboration show active customer engagement. The emphasis on integrating insights into strategic planning and leveraging analytics indicates systematic incorporation of feedback. Creating feedback loops and modeling customer-centric leadership reflect a deep outcome focus aligning products with customer needs. Scores near the genius level reflect the sophistication and thoroughness of the approach, suggesting exceptional leadership in this dimension."}
comments: The CEO demonstrates a strong, comprehensive approach to embedding customer feedback into product development. Establishing multiple feedback channels and fostering cross-functional collaboration show active customer engagement. The emphasis on integrating insights into strategic planning and leveraging analytics indicates systematic incorporation of feedback. Creating feedback loops and modeling customer-centric leadership reflect a deep outcome focus aligning products with customer needs. Scores near the genius level reflect the sophistication and thoroughness of the approach, suggesting exceptional leadership in this dimension.
